set(SOWA_THIRDPARTY_INCLUDES
    ${SOWA_THIRDPARTY_INCLUDES} "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glfw-3.3.8/include"
    ${SOWA_THIRDPARTY_INCLUDES} "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glad/include"
    PARENT_SCOPE)

set(SOWA_THIRDPARTY_SOURCES
    ${SOWA_THIRDPARTY_INCLUDES} "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glad/src/glad.c"
    PARENT_SCOPE)
